author: radup
msg: Contributed by Wing Yew Poon. Update XQueryXPath sample for Saxon 9; remove generated source.

author: jdillon
msg: Replace dojo .tar.gz bits with .zip ones instead, this prevents the build from having to unarchive the .gz into /tmp, which may or may not be on another filesystem, and when its not the same the build crawls.  Also the plexus tar.gz bits are buggy and can't handle files with spaces.  Also using the names of the release artifacts for clarity.
Removed the need for dojoVersion and dojoLegacyVersion properties
